resources.string: copyright app/src/main/res false © 2025 IDR Swap. This application is a mini project to complete Assessment 1 of the Mobile Programming course 1. All content and functionality are developed for learning purposes. This application is 100% the result of personal development with several references.
" Welcome to IDR SWAP! Use this application to calculate the exchange rate from Rupiah to your preferred currency. The exchange rate used is the latest data on March 8, 2025."
